description:
What's new:

- Handled invalid_token issue.

- Fixed sync events requires target group.

- Provided additional methods to enable/disable automatic screen and crash tracking.

- Also, provided additional options for developers to track screen manually, you can use the same options to exclude screens from tracking when automatic tracking is enabled.

- Updated localisation for FeedbackKit.
